extDescription.message: Earn Robux cashback on every single purchase on Roblox!

successPopupMessage.message: You have successfully acquired the $1 for $2.

successPopupCashback.message: $1 has been added to your RoEarn balance.

tooltipRobloxLimited.message: Limiteds created by Roblox are not eligible for cashback.

tooltipNotInGame.message: This item is not eligible because it cannot be purchased in-game.

tooltipPriceTooLow.message: This item's price is too low to receive cashback. Minimum price for cashback is $1 Robux.

tooltipGamepassMinPrice.message: Gamepass price must be higher than 40 Robux to be eligible for cashback.

tooltipGamepassMinPriceShort.message: Gamepass price must be higher than 40 Robux to be eligible for cashback.

errorDiscordSupport.message: Error $1: Please join our Discord support server: discord.gg/roearnsupport

reviewPromptText.message: Did RoEarn work for you? Give us a review!

checkoutSubtitle.message: Get cashback on your Roblox purchase

checkoutStep1.message: Join the RoEarn hub using the play button below.

checkoutStep2.message: You will be prompted to purchase $1 inside the game.

checkoutStep3.message: Your $1 cashback will be instantly credited to your RoEarn balance for withdrawal.

welcomeSubtitle.message: Here's a quick tutorial video to help you get started

referralEntryTitle.message: Did someone invite you to RoEarn?

referralEntryDescription.message: Enter their code below and you'll both get extra cashback!

errorOwnReferralCode.message: You cannot use your own invite code

errorReferralAlreadyUsed.message: You have already used an invite code.

errorInvalidReferralCodeRetry.message: Invalid code. Please check and try again.

bonusAddedText.message: 5 Robux has been added to your RoEarn balance!

errorMinWithdrawal.message: The minimum withdrawal amount is 4 Robux.

withdrawalSuccessMessage.message: Please check your Pending Robux and Sale of Goods in about 45 seconds, as the purchase may take a moment to appear.

referralDescription.message:
Share your invite code. When someone installs RoEarn using your code, you earn 15 Robux instantly!

Anyone who uses your invite code will get 5 Robux!

errorAuthRetry.message: Failed to authenticate. Please try again.

errorFetchGames.message: Failed to fetch your games. Please make sure you have at least one game created.

errorFetchGamesRetry.message: Failed to fetch your games. Please try again.

errorNoGames.message: You need to create a Roblox game first before you can use a referral code. Please create a game and try again.

checkoutBulkStep2Single.message: You will be prompted to purchase your item inside the game.

somethingWentWrong.message: Something went wrong. Please try again in a few minutes.

pendingRobuxNotice.message: You have X Robux pending. Check back in 2 minutes.

tooltipOffSale.message: This item is not eligible for cashback because the original is currently unavailable for purchase.

contentCreatorPayout.message: Get paid 100 Robux per 1,000 views on YouTube & TikTok

contentCreatorDescription.message: The video must be a quality short that clearly showcases the RoEarn extension and its features. It is recommended to post the video on TikTok and YouTube.

contentCreatorContact.message: Contact creators@roearn.io to claim your Robux
